members.signatureBeforeChange: public boolean save(File file, boolean includeOleInfo)
members.signatureAfterChange: public boolean save(File file, boolean includeOleInfo)
diff: -	* Bug in Office 2007. Saving Office 2007 documents to compound file storage object
-	* causes the output file to be corrupted. The fix is to detect Office 2007 documents
-	* using the program ID and save only the content of the 'Package' stream.

members.signatureBeforeChange: public boolean save(File file, boolean includeOleInfo)
members.signatureAfterChange: public boolean save(File file, boolean includeOleInfo)
diff: +	* Bug in Office 2007. Saving Office 2007 documents to compound file storage object
+	* causes the output file to be corrupted. The fix is to detect Office 2007 documents
+	* using the program ID and save only the content of the 'Package' stream.
